channel.title: Deepin on Verummeum
channel.description: Recent content in Deepin on Verummeum

item.title: Deepin 15.8 Review
item.description:
In this article we’ll take a look at a Linux distribution originating from China. The distribution is called Deepin Linux and it is based on Debian’s unstable branch. The Linux distribution only has one desktop version, which includes their own unique Deepin desktop environment.

The purpose of Deepin Linux is to provide an easy to use, reliable and beautiful desktop that meets the needs of most home users. Let’s see if this Chinese distribution achieves its goals!
